text: O vy shcho vvazhayete, vyhlyadayete BOZHI prykhyl聞nyky, yak poslidovnyky Isusa, syna Mary. Koly vin skazav yim, "Khto moyi prykhyl聞nyky do BOHA," vony skazaly, "My ye BOZHI prykhyl聞nyky." Otzhe, hrupa z Ditey Izrayilya vvazhala, ta insha hrupa disbelieved. My dopomohly tsym khto vvazhaly proty yikhn聞oho voroha, do vony peremohly
